<!-- badges:end -->
<!-- overview:start -->

## Overview

Generates a PDF from the brand guidelines page

<!-- overview:end -->
<!-- usage:start -->

## Usage

```yaml
- uses: hoverkraft-tech/landing-page/.github/actions/generate-brand-pdf@3f63c7758b42ac540466ece2db6670da13e45fd8 # copilot/fix-71885492-298575200-7c78ad40-ab54-4cf1-a785-32ce4b970fa9
  with:
    # URL of the brand guidelines page to convert to PDF
    # Default: `http://localhost:4321/charte-graphique`
    page-url: http://localhost:4321/charte-graphique

    # Output PDF file path
    # Default: `application/public/brand/downloads/hoverkraft-brand-guidelines.pdf`
    output-file: application/public/brand/downloads/hoverkraft-brand-guidelines.pdf

    # Working directory for the application
    # Default: `application`
    working-directory: application
```

<!-- usage:end -->
<!-- inputs:start -->

## Inputs

| **Input**               | **Description**                                    | **Required** | **Default**                                                          |
| ----------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **`page-url`**          | URL of the brand guidelines page to convert to PDF | **false**    | `http://localhost:4321/charte-graphique`                             |
| **`output-file`**       | Output PDF file path                               | **false**    | `application/public/brand/downloads/hoverkraft-brand-guidelines.pdf` |
| **`working-directory`** | Working directory for the application              | **false**    | `application`                                                        |

<!-- inputs:end -->
<!-- secrets:start -->
<!-- secrets:end -->
<!-- outputs:start -->

## Outputs

| **Output**          | **Description**                            |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| **`pdf-generated`** | Whether the PDF was successfully generated |

<!-- outputs:end -->
